GapFillInput.Title: The Title
GapFillInput.Instruction: Listen to the video and click on the correct answer.

Content.Question:
1. Amy and Jennifer both think that hunting is cruel.
2. Winek thinks that sometimes it’s necessary to
hunt for environmental reasons.
3. Winek isn’t sure about hunting
forsport or pleasure.
4. Caroline thinks parents should bring up children as they see fit, in other words,
as they choose.
5. Jennifer thinks that it’s probably acceptable to smack children in very extreme cases.
6. Winek thinks that if you smack a child this will have a bad result in later life.
7. Sarahjane thinks that it’s okay for young men to do military service of about six months
to a year.
8. Winek thinks people should have the choice .
